body.name: Farberware Edgekeeper 5-Inch Santoku Knife with Self-Sharpening Blade Cover, High Carbon-Stainless Steel Kitchen Knife with Ergonomic Handle, Razor-Sharp Knife, Black
features: CUTLERY ESSENTIALS: This 5-Inch Santoku Knife is ideal for everyday food prep tasks. This multi-purpose knife features oval indentations that prevent food from sticking to the blade, making it the ideal choice for precision cuts and chopping.

SELF-SHARPENING BLADE COVER: The EdgeKeeper protective sheath features a built-in sharpener designed to sharpen blade edges with every use. This feature ensures the blades retain their razor-sharp edge.
HIGH-QUALITY BLADE: This knife features a high-carbon, stainless steel blade which ensure the knife retains its ultra-sharp edge and making food prep effortless.
COMFORT GRIP: Ergonomically designed for a comfortable grip; this knife is designed for chopping, dicing, and mincing.
EASY CARE: Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately; wipe protective blade cover as needed with a damp cloth.
body.description: This Farberware Edgekeeper 5 inch Santoku Knife features oval indentations that prevent food from sticking to the blade. This multi-purpose knife excels at precision cuts and chopping due to its shorter length and flat cutting edge. Blade cover features a built in knife sharpener to easily and conveniently sharpen knife with every use. This knife features ergonomically designed handles for long lasting comfort. Knife features ultra sharp high carbon stainless steel blades. Easily store and protect knife with blade cover. Includes: 5-inch santoku knife with self-sharpening blade cover. Hand wash recommended with warm water and mild detergent. Instructions for use of Built-in Knife Sharpener: Step 1: Hold bottom of sharpening sleeve and gently remove knife with opposite hand. Step 2: Blade edge will sharpen as knife is removed from sleeve, as well as inserted into sleeve.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The blade covers are especially designed with patented built-in Edgekeeper technology--your blade gets sharpened every time you place it in or pull it our of the cover. Our ergonomic handles are expertly designed to enhance comfort and control while using, adding to the optimal cutting experience. The stainless steel blades slice through all kinds of foods with precision and without tearing, making meals prep quick and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp, great price, good weight and balance, and comes with a sharpening cover.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best paring knife that I have ever had, including my expensive one. It is very sharp, and it is comfortable to hold. I like that it comes with a blade cover, and that it has a sharpener in it so that it gets a bit of sharpening ever time you use it. The price is very reasonable at $6.99. I am very pleased with this knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best knife ever!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Farberware 5" Santoku knife.***Pros***This knife is excellent. I love Santoku knives for cutting vegetables and sometimes even use it for meat. This knife is sharp, cuts well, and comes with a sharpening sleeve (which I have misplaced so it is not pictured, but it did come with it!). I will definitely be buying more of these!***Cons***I would recommend replacing all your knives with sharp ones. We purchased this knife which is very sharp and I accidentally cut myself a little bit because I was so used to how my dull knives cut. That is not a flaw of the product, but instead a flaw in how my dull knives trained me to be lax on kitchen safety and was worth mentioning so that you are more careful. This is a great knife and the sharpness is an attribute. 100% I will be purchasing this again, 5/5 stars. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Silly to have the blade “sharpener” attached. The knife is a cheap knife, but fits the price point. I use these for the bars I service in my knife exchange business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little knife is awesome. Maybe a teeny bit long for pairing something small but for everything else it's great. Every time I use it wash it and dry it I sharpen it in the built-in sharpener so it's ready for the next time. It's perfect. You got to get one. I'm buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little paring knife!
reviews.reviewText: Makes a good addition to a lunchbox or picnic basket, with the sheath and it's sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Kitchen Knife
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this knife! Had for several months and cuts everything without resistance. Fits the hand and not heavy. Easy to remove and replace in sheath. My go-to knife for everything in the kitchen! AND I would prefer to do anything but COOK...so this review says alot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality of Metal & Unsafe Design
reviews.reviewText: I would like to start by simply saying, you get what you pay for.I am a knife/blade collector, I collect any kinds of blades, whether it be knives, swords, machetes, axes, so I know a good blade when I see/use one. First off, the metal used for this cleaver is very weak. So weak in fact that when I put it in the sheath and took it back out, it got stuck on part of the plastic and it took the edge off that part of the blade. Plastic shouldn't bend or chip metal ever. The cleaver is not very heavy, so if you plan on using this cleaver rather than it being a display piece, save yourself the hassle and get something worth chopping with.As for this not being safe, there are two concerns/observations. First, all around the cleaver where the blade IS NOT, is sharp, like every machined edge is sharp enough to cut yourself on if you arent careful or if your hand slips. Not as sharp as the blade itself, but still something to be aware of. The second safety issue is the positioning of the handle relative to the blade. Its almost like the handle is formed and angled in the perfect way for someone to cut themselves. What I mean by this is when I first held the cleaver, I had uncurled my middle finger(aka extended it out to where its not around the handle) and when I was bringing my finger back to the position around the handle, my finger hit the blade and cut it. Luckily it didn't go deep, but I guarantee it easily could have.Overall, only buy this if you either are going to use it for display or if you want a garbage kitchen tool. The only good thing I can say is that it comes sharp enough to shave hair off my arm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat this for the price
reviews.reviewText: Our favorite chef knife broke. It was our go to knife so I wasn't happy. I was reluctant to buy this knife because of the price but I pulled the trigger because it had good reviews. I am amazed to get such a great knife for the price. The included sharpening holder is an added bonus. This is perfect for an everyday go to knife. It stays sharp and since it wasn't expensive, I'm not worried about hurting it. It's perfect!!
Llego rápido, descripción coincide con lo entregado. Buena calidad.
bonjour,j'ai bien reçu ma commande, mais je suis très déçu de l'article, nous l'avons déjà utilisé et jeté la boîte, mais ça ne coupe vraiment pas bien.

Excelente cuchillo, trae muy buen filo y el estuche protector es perfecto, me gusta la opción que trae de auto afilar el cuchillo al desenvainar, de hecho me sirve para afilar otros cuchillos de dimensiones similares.
La calidad es muy buena, me parece que por el costo superó mis espectativas.
Los uso diario, me encantan la verdad, cocino diariamente y estoy muy contento con varios modelo que compré de la marca, me gusta mucho, los recomiendo enormemente!!
